CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 17,18 Quinacridone ( QC ) derivative , which is known as a red - violet pigment , has a high crystallinity and self - assembled characteristics , so it has drawn significant attention as an OTFT because of its high mobility.

Let's think step by step.

1. Quinacridone (QC)
2. Quinacridone derivative

Both Quinacridone and its derivative are material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Quinacridone derivative

The paragraph mentions "Quinacridone derivative" as the specific material name that is the focus of the discussion. "Quinacridone" is mentioned as the parent compound, but it is not the material name being discussed in the context of OTFTs (Organic Thin Film Transistors) and high mobility.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 17,18 Quinacridone ( QC ) derivative , which is known as a red - violet pigment , has a high crystallinity and self - assembled characteristics , so it has drawn significant attention as an OTFT because of its high mobility.

Let's think step by step.

1. Quinacridone (QC) derivative: This is a specific type of compound or pigment.
2. High crystallinity: This is a property or characteristic of the Quinacridone derivative.
3. Self-assembled characteristics: This is another property or characteristic of the Quinacridone derivative.
4. Significant attention: This is a measure of interest or importance.
5. OTFT: This stands for Organic Thin Film Transistor, which is a type of electronic device.
6. High mobility: This is a property or characteristic of the Organic Thin Film Transistor.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. High crystallinity: This is a property or characteristic of the Quinacridone derivative.
2. High mobility: This is a property or characteristic of the Organic Thin Film Transistor.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| High crystallinity (property of Quinacridone derivative) |
| High mobility (property of Organic Thin Film Transistor) |
